projects.title: AI Code Assistant
projects.description: Advanced AI-powered code completion and debugging tool using GPT-4 and static analysis.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive AI development tool that combines large language models with static code analysis to provide intelligent code suggestions, bug detection, and performance optimization recommendations.

projects.title: DeFi Portfolio Tracker
projects.description: Real-time Web3 portfolio tracking with advanced analytics and yield optimization.
projects.longDescription: A sophisticated DeFi portfolio management platform that aggregates data from multiple blockchains, provides real-time analytics, and suggests yield farming opportunities.

projects.title: Neural Style Transfer API
projects.description: High-performance API for artistic style transfer using deep learning models.
projects.longDescription: A scalable REST API that applies artistic styles to images using neural style transfer algorithms, optimized for production use with GPU acceleration.

projects.title: AIALCHEMIST Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive AI development platform with model training, deployment, and monitoring.
projects.longDescription: Enterprise-grade AI platform that simplifies the entire ML lifecycle from data preparation to model deployment and monitoring in production environments.

projects.title: Smart Contract Auditor
projects.description: Automated smart contract vulnerability detection and security analysis tool.
projects.longDescription: Advanced static analysis tool that identifies security vulnerabilities, gas optimization opportunities, and compliance issues in Solidity smart contracts.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Analytics
projects.description: AI-powered sentiment analysis and insights for chat applications.
projects.longDescription: Real-time chat monitoring system with sentiment analysis, topic detection, and automated moderation capabilities for online communities.
